EmailTemplate.name: Exam fail notification - LS OSW
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - You didn’t pass the {!Education_History__c.Exam_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're sorry to tell you that you didn’t pass the {!Education_History__c.Exam_Type__c} you took on {!Education_History__c.Scheduled_Date__c}.
The required score was {!Education_History__c.Exam_Required_Score__c}.
Your score was {!Education_History__c.Score__c}.
Your score summary: [Section 1] [Applicant score]/[# of questions] [Percentage] [Section 2] [Applicant score]/[# of questions] [Percentage] [Etc. …]
You must retake the exam.
Go to our website to see exam dates and deadlines:
Land Surveyor On-site Wastewater Designer
Register for the exam through our new online system:
Go to {!Education_History__c.License_Portal_URL__c}. Sign in or create an account and follow instructions.
To register for the exam by mail:
Fill out the Reexam or Exam Reschedule Application (pdf) form Print completed form Include payment for the exam fee Mail completed form and payment to the address on the form
Questions? Need help? {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Type__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Email__c} {!Education_History__c.License_Program_Phone__c}
Thank you.
Department of Licensing www.dol.wa.gov APP016
